main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported near Loring AFB, Maine on October 22-23, 1959.
interesting points: A civilian reported a low flying object with small red lights, which was still visible late at night., The Air Police observed an object flying at low altitude with red and green lights 16 miles south of Loring AFB., Two F-102 jets were scrambled but did not find any visible object despite radar indications., Radar at the Carsewall CGI Site detected an object at 35,000 feet., Multiple sightings were reported by civilians and military personnel in the area, indicating unusual activity at the time.
sighted object: low flying object with red and green lights
